name: Daino, Appellant, v. Atlantic Refining Company

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Daino, Appellant, v. Atlantic Refining Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Alexander, reported in 20 Pa. D. & C. 2d 470.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Gordon W. Gerber, with Mm Owen B. Rhoads, and Barnes, Dechert, Price, Myers & Rhoads, for defendants, appellees.
Frank Garano, with Mm Milton H. Kunken, and Garano & Kunken, for interpleaded - claimant-appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Daino, Appellant, v. Atlantic Refining Company.
Argued April 25, 1960.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Eagen, JJ.
reargument refused June 14, 1960.
Raymond J. Porreca, for appellant.
Gordon W. Gerber, with Mm Owen B. Rhoads, and Barnes, Dechert, Price, Myers & Rhoads, for defendants, appellees.
Frank Garano, with Mm Milton H. Kunken, and Garano & Kunken, for interpleaded - claimant-appellee.
May 23, 1960:
